Class JavaMail

java.lang.Object
JavaMail
public class JavaMail extends Object
This is java mail class that sends an email to the user Maven POM.xml file is used for dependency management. We use JavaMail API to send the email. We also use activation jar for activation of the email. Simple Mail Transfer Protocol is used to send the email.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Saurabh Chapagain
See Also:
  • JavaMail , RetrieverReady

    void
    emailValidation(String email)
    This is the email validation method that checks if the email is valid or not I used a regular expression (regex) to check if the email is valid or not
    protected static String
    password()
    This method is used to return the password of the account i am using to send the email
    static void
    sendEmail()
    This method is used to send the email to the user using Simple Mail Transfer Protocol
    static void
    wantEmail()
    This method is used to ask if the user wants an email or not
